name: Beyond the Trispyre
description:
Beyond the Trispyre is a fantasy roleplaying game.

While BTT may feel similar to other roleplaying games you have played or read in the past, the goal of Beyond the Trispyre is to provide an old-school feeling session (complete with the grand fantasy that you know and love), but without the convoluted old-fashioned mechanics.

As such, BTT is a rules-light, narrative-strong fantasy roleplaying game, designed to be easy to learn and to get you and your players up and running quickly.
